szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.intrfc.arena.game.world

Interface GameWorldBasic

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GameWorldPrivileged, GameWorldUpdatable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TreasureScooperWorld

    public interface GameWorldBasic
    The interface for the game world of a particular level

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<TunnelCellBasic> getCells()
      Gets a set of all tunnel cells (those of horizontal as well as interconnecting tunnels) representing the game world.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TunnelCellBasic> getEntrances()
      Gets all entrances into the underground tunnel maze.
      int getHeight()
      Gets the height of the game world.
      int getNuggetCount()
      Gets the number of remaining pieces of treasure in the game world.
      int getOffsetX()
      Gets the size of a TunnelCell in the horizontal direction.
      int getOffsetY()
      Gets the size of a TunnelCell in the horizontal direction.
      java.util.Set<HorizontalTunnelBasic> getTunnels()
      Gets a set of all HorizontalTunnelBasic in the game world (no sorting order).
      int getWidth()
      Gets the width of the game world.

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Gets the width of the game world.
        Returns:
        the absolute width of the game gameInterface.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Gets the height of the game world.
        Returns:
        the absolute height of the game gameInterface.

      • getOffsetX

        int getOffsetX()
        Gets the size of a TunnelCell in the horizontal direction.
        Returns:
        the size of one cell of the game world grid (the size of a cell coordinate offset)

      • getOffsetY

        int getOffsetY()
        Gets the size of a TunnelCell in the horizontal direction.
        Returns:
        the size of one cell of the game world grid (the size of a cell coordinate offset)

      • getNuggetCount

        int getNuggetCount()
        Gets the number of remaining pieces of treasure in the game world.
        Returns:
        the current number of pieces of treasure in the game world.

      • getEntrances

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TunnelCellBasic> getEntrances()
        Gets all entrances into the underground tunnel maze. All have a unique String id.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable map of entrance IDs to their tunnel cell entrance.

      • getTunnels

        java.util.Set<HorizontalTunnelBasic> getTunnels()
        Gets a set of all HorizontalTunnelBasic in the game world (no sorting order).
        Returns:
        all horizontal tunnels of the game world as an unmodifiable set.

      • getCells

        java.util.Set<TunnelCellBasic> getCells()
        Gets a set of all tunnel cells (those of horizontal as well as interconnecting tunnels) representing the game world.
        Returns:
        the set of all tunnel cells of the game world.
